segments.text: I've been feeling under the weather recently . I caught a bad cold last week , and I still haven't got over it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you wanna take a sick leave ? All you need now is a good , long rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess so . Even though I seem to be over the worst of it . I don't want to give the bug to anyone in the office .
segments.speaker: S2
